content: croche� cha�stic� h olde� written and designed by amy kate sutherland this simple crochet chapstick holder is one of the most functionable things i ve ever made and one of my most favorite designs using cotton yarn and a smaller hook to maintain a tight gauge it will last forever and keep your chapstick safe i encourage you to make one for all your friends i hope you enjoy this pattern crochet chapstick holder | page 1 of 4 materials - 15 yards of wecrochet dishie or any other worsted weight cotton yarn - size e 3 5 mm crochet hook - one key ring - scissors - yarn needle - ruler to check gauge gauge in order to ensure that the chapstick tube fits snuggle into its holder i suggest achieving the recommended gauge 6 sts and 6 row = 1 inch in single_crochet pattern notes - follow the video tutorial here https //youtu be/l_u6vxgx5sk - find the yarn used for the sample here - because of how small this holder is i recommend weaving in the starting tail within the first couple of rounds instead of waiting till the end of the project - this holder is worked in a spiral do not slip_stitch unless directed to - to attach the key ring after you make the chain slide the key ring through the chapstick holder from bottom to top and onto the chain abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch ea each f/o finish off st s stitch es crochet chapstick holder | page 2 of 4 pattern make a magic_ring beginner modification make a slip knot and chain 2 then work the round 1 instructions into the second chain from the hook round 1 single_crochet 5 into the magic_ring/chain 5 sts round 2 single_crochet 2 in ea st around 10 sts rounds 3-12 single_crochet in ea st around 10 sts round 13 slip_stitch in next st chain 5 and slide the key ring onto the chain see pattern notes or tutorial slip_stitch into the next st f/o and weave in your ends enjoy your new chapstick holder crochet chapstick holder | page 3 of 4 fin� an� follo� m� instagram @thegracefultangle etsy the graceful tangle pinterest the graceful tangle youtube the graceful tangle email thegracefultangle@gmail com than� yo� thank you so much for supporting me and my small business by choosing to make my pattern i hope it has left you feeling inspired and motivated to continue enjoying the art of knitting and crochet but even more importantly always remember that no matter who you are what you ve been through what you re going through or what you will go through god loves you he loves you so much that he sent his one and only son jesus to die on the cross for your sins the decision to follow him will be the most important and the most rewarding decision you ll ever make he loves you crochet chapstick holder | page 4 of
